entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The Gryffindor team is mentioned as having goalposts.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Professor Wood is mentioned as someone Harry considers asking to call time out.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's broom is behaving strangely and he is being carried higher away from the game.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: The Slytherins are cheering and in possession of the Quaffle.

entities.name: flint
entities.description: Flint is mentioned as having the Quaffle.

entities.name: spinnet
entities.description: Spinnet is mentioned as receiving a pass from Flint.

entities.name: bell
entities.description: Bell is mentioned as receiving a pass from Spinnet.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as staring through his binoculars and commenting on Harry's situation.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of the Gryffindor team.
Flint is a part of the Slytherin team.
Spinnet is a part of the Slytherin team.
Bell is a part of the Slytherin team.
